title: Investment by public sector power companies to rise nearly 14 pc to Rs 67,286 crore in FY25
description: Investment by hydro power giant SJVN Ltd has been hiked to Rs 12,000 crore for 2024-25, from the revised and budgeted amount of Rs 10,000 crore for the ongoing fiscal. Another hydro power giant NHPC Ltd will increase its investment to Rs 11,761.87 crore in 2024-25 compared to the revised estimated investment of Rs 9,006.31 crore for the current fiscal. NHPC's initial investment was budgeted at Rs 10,857.22 crore for 2023-24.
